abstract: Identifies this toolbar content as the source of a navigation transition, such as a zoom transition.

declaration.code: nonisolated func matchedTransitionSource(id: some Hashable, in namespace: Namespace.ID) -> some ToolbarContent

overview:
## Discussion

Use this modifier in conjunction with `View.navigationTransition(_:)` to provide a source for the transition effect:
title: matchedTransitionSource(id:in:)
